backend/main.mo: Defines core workout, exercise, recovery, and user profile types plus an exercise library for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains evidence metadata linking features, files, components, and tests for a deployment-related requirement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend source files and their functionality.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Logs deployment retry attempts and documents applied backend workout-generation fixes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file configuring PWA metadata, icons, splash screens, and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines PWA manifest settings including app name, icons, theme, and display configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container handling authentication flow, page routing, splash screen timing, and workout validation before navigation.
Modal component for updating bodyweight with validation and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with tab buttons and a settings modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal to select and record alternative exercises, fetching suggestions and updating backend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding, settings button, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Custom pull‑to‑refresh wrapper implementing touch tracking and refresh indicators.
Displays muscle recovery status with loading states and optional weighted leg recovery calculation.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Settings modal for editing user profile fields, handling validation, saving, and dark mode toggling.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen splash screen showing an animated dumbbell and app title during app load.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Top status bar displaying the user's streak and today's date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal that generates QR codes and share links for a workout and supports link copying and Web Share API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend actor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs, handling errors, validation, and profile defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook implementing robust screen wake lock acquisition, release, and auto‑reacquisition with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global dark theme styles, defining color variables, typography, mobile optimizations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/profileCache.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides helpers to save, load, validate, clear, and check active workout sessions in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utility functions to convert nanosecond timestamps, validate them, and format them into readable date strings.
Builds ordered workout sections from exercises, grouping by muscle group with special handling for leg subgroups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing workout history, recovery data, and user metrics with refresh, formatting, and modal logic.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: History page listing past workouts, date formatting, calendar highlighting, and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Lets users choose a workout type and triggers generation of full, upper, or lower body workouts.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects initial user profile data such as gender, weight, rest times, and saves it to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays muscle recovery status and weekly volume data with refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Shows a generated workout, validates its structure, and allows regenerating or swapping exercises before starting.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Handles active workout tracking, including sets, timers, rest management, exercise changes, and saving session data.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for exercises, workouts, recovery states, and related data used exclusively on the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, breakpoints, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to backend fixes and build processes.
